reference.title: Managing Index parameters
reference.shortdesc: The Index service parameters are retrieved and changed with the GET and POST HTTP methods and the /settings/indexes URI.

dlentry.dd: Number of dedicated threads the indexer uses. On multi-core machines increasing this number increases the amount of CPU available to the indexer. Default: 4
The maximum number of committed rollback points. Default: 5
Specifies the frequency of in-memory snapshots. This determines the earliest possibility of a scan seeing a given KV mutation. Specified in milleseconds (ms). Default: 200
Specifies the frequency of persisted snapshots for recovery. Specified in seconds (sec). Default: 30000
